("A sword by itself does not slay: it is merely the weapon used by the slayer.") -Lucius Annaeus Seneca, _Epistulae Morales ad Lucilium_, Letter LXXXVII: Some arguments in favor of the simple life, 1. 30. ca. 65 A.D. trans. Richard Mott Gummere, 1917.}} {{crawlquote|This weapon falls into the '[[Long Blades]]' category. It is a two handed weapon.}} '''Great swords''' are large, two handed [[Long Blades]] that deal good damage, though they require high Long Blades skill to reach minimum delay. [[Triple sword]]s are stronger, but considerably rarer. ==Strategy== Great swords are rarely found on the Dungeon floor. However, they can occasionally generate on enemy [[wight]]s, [[orc warrior]]s, [[orc knight]]s, and a few other enemies. You may prefer a [[demon blade]] or [[double sword]]; they deal slightly less damage, but can be worn with a [[shield]]. However, both weapons are rarer. The great sword is considerably stronger than other one-handed Long Blades (such as the [[scimitar]]). {| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:auto; padding:0; text-align: center" ! || Image |- | '''Mundane''' || [[File:Greatsword1.png]] |- | '''Magical''' || [[File:Greatsword2.png]] |- | '''Artifact''' || [[File:Greatsword3.png]] |} {| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:auto; padding:0; text-align: center" ! || [[Unrandarts|Unrandart]]
